com.github.mrdimosthenis.synapses

Class Codec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrdimosthenis.synapses.Codec

  • public class Codec
extends java.lang.Object
    The constructors and methods of codecs.

    Create a codec: 

     
 Map<String, String> setosa = Map.of(
      "petal_length", "1.5",
      "species", "setosa"
 );

 Map<String, String> versicolor = Map.of(
      "petal_length", "3.8",
      "species", "versicolor"
 );

 Stream dataset = Arrays.stream(new Map[]{setosa, versicolor});

 Attribute[] attributes = {
      new Attribute("petal_length", false),
      new Attribute("species", true)
 };

 Codec codec = new Codec(attributes, dataset);

    Encode a data point: 

     
 codec.encode(setosa);

    Decode a data point: 

     
 codec.decode(new double[]{0.0, 1.0, 0.0});

    Get the JSON representation of the codec: 

     
 codec.json();

        Creates a codec by consuming a stream of data points.
        Parameters:
        attributes - An array of attributes that defines their names and types (discrete or not).
        datapoints - A stream that contains the data points.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public double[] encode(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> datapoint)
        Encodes a data point.
        Parameters:
        datapoint - A data point as a map of strings.
        Returns:
        The encoded data point as an array of numbers between 0.0 and 1.0.

      • decode

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> decode(double[] encodedValues)
        Decodes a data point.
        Parameters:
        encodedValues - An encoded data point as an array of numbers between 0.0 and 1.0.
        Returns:
        The decoded data point as a map of strings.
